===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こくしょく}} compound {{m|zh|國色|tr=kwok srik|lit=nation + beauty}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|國色|most beautiful woman of a country; peony}}.

{{ja-noun|こくしょく|kyu=國色}}

# most beautiful [[woman]] of a country
# [[peony]]
